function.name: generate_tenant_protection_packet
function.description: Generate a complete Tenant Protection Packet containing all defense documents for eviction cases. Includes Cover Letter, Notice Response, ADA Request, Ledger Dispute, Emergency Stay Motion (if trial < 30 days), Affidavit of Truth, Proof of Service, Exhibits, Court Script, and Filing Checklist. Documents can be merged into a single file and/or packaged as a ZIP.

landlord_name.description: Landlord's name or property management company

trial_date.description: Scheduled trial date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

disability_status.description: Description of any disability status for ADA compliance

benefits.description: Types of benefits received (e.g., Section 8, SSDI)

trust_involved.description: Whether the ISIAH TARIK HOWARD TRUST is involved (default: true)

ada_notes.description: Notes related to ADA accommodations or requests

ledger_dispute_details.description: Details of any ledger or payment disputes

service_issues.description: Any issues with service of process

mail_tampering.description: Whether mail tampering is alleged (generates Exhibit C)

merged_output.description: Whether to merge all documents into a single PDF

include_zip.description: Whether to create a ZIP package of all files

header_footer_style.description: Header/footer style. Style B: black header, gold footer

packet_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated packet

merged_pdf_url.description: URL to the merged PDF (if merged_output=true)

zip_url.description: URL to the ZIP package (if include_zip=true)
